text: Harry Rosen Inc. is a Canadian retail chain with 17 luxury men's clothing stores. Harry Rosen operate for 40 percent of the Canadian market in clothes for man in 2008.Chetty, Derick. "Menswear for every age and every stage". September 2, 2008. The Toronto Star, page L1 The company was founded by Harry Rosen in 1954. In 2009, Harry Rosen opened their own website. Shipping is limited to Canadian addresses.JC Williams Group. Harry Rosen Online Press Release. Published May 15, 2009. Retrieved June 10, 2009 ==References== Category:Retail companies of Canada Category:1954 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in Toronto
title: Harry Rosen Inc.
